BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Disabilities and Addiction

Items.Title: Oversight - Current Access and Operations of New York City's 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Current Access and Operations of New York City's 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the commissioner of health and mental hygiene to report annually on suicides that occur in the city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of health and mental hygiene to report annually on suicides that occur in the city.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a construction site opioid antagonist program
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a construction site opioid antagonist program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to introduce and pass, and the President to sign, legislation to incorporate mental wellness training within OSHA-10 and OSHA-30 training.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Incorporate mental wellness training within OSHA-10 and OSHA-30 training.
